entry.title: [GRA/BHS][LogsDataPlatform] - OpenSearch upgrade notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 27, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jun 13, 15:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/08/2024 12:00 UTC
End time : 27/08/2024 15:00 UTC
Service Impact : Logs ingestion will be lagging for 60 minutes and OpenSearch API and OpenSearch Dashboards will be unavailable for 60 minutes during the maintenance.
Graylog API and WebUI will still be available.
Service improvement : As Part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform a major upgrade on OpenSearch and OpenSearch Dashboards from version 1 to 2.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA5][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Kubernetes Service incident notification
entry.content:
Jul 8, 13:11 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/07/2024 18:00 UTC
End time : 08/07/2024 13:07 UTC
Service impact : Managed nodes running in GRA5 Public Cloud region might have encountered volume issues (volume couldn't be properly attached to node).
Root cause :Missing properties on Openstack image used in GRA5 Public Cloud to build managed nodes.
During updates which aims to reduce the nodes delivery times, these properties have been unintentionally modified. Misconfigured properties are preventing the CSI component to select the correct driver to use during attachment of Cinder volumes at the operating system level.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 8, 10:36 UTC
Identified - Start time : 07/07/2024 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Managed nodes running in GRA5 Public Cloud region may encounter volume issues (volume can't be properly attached to node).
Root cause : Missing properties on Openstack image used in GRA5 Public Cloud to build managed nodes.
During updates which aims to reduce the nodes delivery times, these properties have been unintentionally modified. Misconfigured properties are preventing the CSI component to select the correct driver to use during attachment of Cinder volumes at the operating system level.
Ongoing actions : A patch will be shorty released and we will force rebuilt all impacted nodes.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Jul 8, 09:53 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/07/2024 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Managed nodes running in GRA5 Public Cloud region may encounter volume issues (volume can't be properly attached to node).
Ongoing actions : A patch will be shorty released and we will force rebuilt all impacted nodes.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA3/5/7/9/11][Public Cloud] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
Jul 3, 14:03 UTC
Completed - We are sorry to inform you that this maintenance is postponed to another date. We will keep you updated as soon as the date is fixed.

Jun 26, 04:18 UTC
Scheduled - This maintenance may temporarily affect Latency.

Start time : 24/07/2024 20:00 UTC
End time : 25/07/2024 03:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except in rare case latencies may be noted to reach PCI instances running
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters
The operation is carried out in several steps:

-Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
-Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
-Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)

The critical phase of this upgrade is tentatively scheduled between 11:00 PM UTC and 1:00 AM UTC. We are not expecting any impact. However in case of an issue the rollback can be managed in less than 30 minutes.

Thank you for your understanding.
